name: Shadow Run
description:
You will not regret buying Shadow Run if you are looking for a game to spend a great fun time in a relaxed and unsaturated way

Shadow Run is a fast paced endless runner game. Shoot guards and pick up coins while increasing your distance. The player can jump, slide, shoot and double jump to create a challenging yet addictive game. The unique look of the game and it’s simple game play guarantee fun to all its players.
In addition Shadow Run is a perfect game for all ages and audiences, thanks to its ease to understand it, but beware, Shadow Run is not an easy game.

Main features
- Infinite world generation
- Several elements like a character, guard, platforms and coins
- Keyboard and touch controls
- Running, jumping, sliding and shooting character
- Pick up coins and shoot guards
- How to play panel
- Auto saving distance and fun gameplay
